content.rendered:
February 6, 2023 – As Viceroy prepare an extended case study highlighting MPW exposure to international criminal inquiries, we present readers with a fun throwback to 2018, when the SEC questioned MPW’s uncommercial transactions.

A link to the correspondence is below:

https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1287865/000119312518271134/filename1.htm

The background to the SEC’s questions related to MPW’s determination that it was unnecessary to disclose Steward Healthcare’s financials as an exhibit to its 10-K, which is broadly consistent with Steward and MPW’s minimal-transparency policy.
